properties.areaDesc: Union, KY; Gallatin, IL; Hardin, IL; Crittenden, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 9:30PM CST until January 20 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Kentucky...Illinois...

Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam and Shawneetown

.Heavy rainfall along the Ohio and Wabash Rivers will cause water
levels to rise to minor flood stage around mid week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Shawneetown.
* from Tuesday to Monday, January 20.
* At  8:30 PM Saturday the stage was 31.2 feet.
* Flood Stage is 33.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late Tuesday, and will
continue to rise to near 36.4 feet by Saturday morning, January 18th.
The river will fall below flood stage by Monday morning, January 20th.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
